snippet: The Drones and Aerial Robotics Conference, which started Friday, seemed equal parts acknowledgment of the technology’s perils and a self-affirmation exercise for its proponents.
abstract: Drones and Aerial Robotics Conference, held at New York University, offers both acknowledgment of technology’s perils and self-affirmation exercise for its proponents, who have cited the potential of drones to improve agriculture practices and monitor endangered species, among other applications.
lead_paragraph: The Drones and Aerial Robotics Conference, which started Friday, seemed equal parts acknowledgment of the technology’s perils and a self-affirmation exercise for its proponents.

headline.main: At Drone Conference, Talk of Morals and Toys
headline.print_headline: At Drone Conference, Talk of Morals and Toys
